features.description: Keep track of changes to code and collaborate with others.
Request code reviews and track changes before merging.
Manage bugs and feature requests effectively.

tools.name: Kaggle
tools.description: A platform for data science and machine learning, providing datasets, competitions, and collaborative notebooks.
tools.limitations: Limited resources for free users compared to Paid options.

features.description: Compete in data science challenges and improve your skills.
Explore and use datasets for your projects.
Create and share Jupyter notebooks for collaborative work.

tools.name: Codecademy
tools.description: An interactive platform that offers coding classes in various programming languages.
tools.limitations: Some content is behind a paywall; limited features for free users.

features.description: Learn by doing with hands-on coding exercises.
Structured learning paths for various tech careers.
Build projects to apply your coding knowledge.

tools.name: Coursera
tools.description: An online learning platform offering courses from top universities and companies in computer science and beyond.
tools.limitations: Free access to some course materials; certificates require payment.

features.description: Access to courses from renowned institutions.
Deep dive into specific topics with guided learning paths.
Get feedback on assignments from fellow learners.

tools.name: Kahoot!

tools.limitations: Free version has limited features; advanced features require a subscription.

Track student progress and performance with analytics.

tools.description: A free web service for schools to streamline the process of sharing files between teachers and students.
tools.limitations: Requires a Google account; limited to users within an educational institution.

features.description: Create, distribute, and grade assignments efficiently.
Facilitate group work and projects with shared resources.
Seamlessly integrate with other Google services like Docs, Drive, and Sheets.

tools.name: Quizlet
tools.description: A learning tool that allows teachers and students to create and study flashcards, quizzes, and games.
tools.limitations: Free version offers basic features; premium subscription unlocks advanced functionalities.

features.description: Create flashcards for any subject or topic.
Allow students to contribute to study materials.
Engage students with games that reinforce learning.

tools.name: Edmodo
tools.description: A secure platform that connects teachers, students, and parents for communication and collaboration.
tools.limitations: Free for basic use; advanced features may require payment.

features.description: Facilitate communication between teachers, students, and parents.
Create and track assignments for students.
Share resources and materials with students easily.

tools.name: Nearpod
tools.description: An interactive lesson platform that allows teachers to engage students with multimedia presentations and assessments.
tools.limitations: Basic features are free; advanced features require a subscription.

features.description: Create engaging presentations with interactive elements.
Conduct quizzes and polls during lessons.
Provide immersive learning experiences with VR.

tools.limitations: Advanced features available in the Paid version.

features.description: Generates creative recipes using the ingredients you already have.
Creates personalized meal plans based on dietary preferences.
Provides nutritional analysis of recipes to maintain balanced meals.

tools.description: IBM’s AI tool that helps chefs generate innovative recipes by combining unique flavors.
tools.limitations: Limited ingredient database in the free version.

features.description: Recommends innovative flavor combinations to create unique recipes.
Generates experimental dishes based on user preferences and ingredients.

tools.limitations: Nutritional tracking requires manual input for some ingredients.

features.description: Helps chefs plan meals for the week based on nutrition and preferences.
Finds recipes based on ingredients, dietary restrictions, or cuisine.

tools.description: AI tool that suggests new and unique ingredient pairings for recipes.
tools.limitations: Limited ingredient combinations in free tier.

features.description: Provides innovative flavor pairings based on molecular composition.
Helps chefs create unique dishes using scientifically based ingredient pairings.

tools.limitations: Advanced meal planning options are restricted.

features.description: Allows users to save recipes and create personalized meal plans.

tools.name: RescueTime

tools.limitations: Limited features in the free version.

features.description: Tracks time spent on apps and websites without manual input.
Provides detailed reports to help improve work efficiency.

tools.limitations: Free version lacks advanced reporting features.

features.description: Tracks time on tasks and projects with ease.

tools.name: Clockify

tools.limitations: Free version has limited reporting options.

features.description: Allows users to track unlimited projects and tasks.
Generates visual reports to help analyze work patterns.

tools.limitations: Limited session history in the free version.

tools.name: Trello
